title: Scariest film I have ever seen...
review:
I'm going to keep this short, I just went to see the preview screening in London. My friend who I went with spent a good portion of the film screaming and burying her head in my shoulder. I have bruises on my arm from where she was grabbing me so hard.The start of the film is sort of Scream-esque - probably on purpose to get you off guard...'just another teen horror film'After that...well.. heh just go watch it....if you think Event Horizon was scary...this is to the power of ten...
brilliant film
